Python-bundle-PyPI
==================

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Python-bundle-PyPI installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Python-bundle-PyPI, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Python-bundle-PyPI/2024.06-GCCcore-13.3.0
```
